svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - December 2 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
December 2, 2023" date: "2023-12-01"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Devnet-12 launched,
likely to run over holidays, Prysm expect to join in ~2 weeks Upgrade process discussion: upgrade
documents in PM repo, meta EIPs for each upgrade and considered for inclusion (CFI) label
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
â€¢ Devnet-12 launched, likely to run over holidays, Prysm expect to join in ~2 weeks
Devnet-12 launched, likely to run over holidays, Prysm expect to join in ~2 weeks
â€¢ Upgrade process discussion: upgrade documents in PM repo, meta EIPs for each upgrade and considered
for inclusion (CFI) label
Upgrade process discussion: upgrade documents in PM repo, meta EIPs for each upgrade and considered
â€¢ Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
Prague + Electra upgrade
â€¢ Upgrade meta discussion : community input into which features (EIPs) to include
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.28% increasing towards 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 32.28% increasing towards 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41% & Lighthouse 34%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Timing games are bad for Ethereum P2P.org (Lido founders) are delaying requests up to 1 second to
increase MEV
Timing games are bad for Ethereum
â€¢ P2P.org (Lido founders) are delaying requests up to 1 second to increase MEV
â€¢ Pari (EF DevOps): how to create a shadow fork
Pari (EF DevOps): how to create a shadow fork

For Stakers
â€¢ Dappnode MEV smoothing pool for solo stakers
Dappnode MEV smoothing pool for solo stakers
â€¢ Obol (distributed validators) live, beta, clusters capped at 1 validator
Obol (distributed validators) live, beta, clusters capped at 1 validator
â€¢ Lighthouse user experience survey
Lighthouse user experience survey
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Nimbus v23.11.0 : Obol enhanced support, improved scoring algorithms to maximize
block rewards with multiple beacon nodes, simple bootstrapping and performance improvements for 10k+
validators on a single machine
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Nimbus v23.11.0 : Obol enhanced support, improved scoring algorithms to maximize block rewards with
multiple beacon nodes, simple bootstrapping and performance improvements for 10k+ validators on a
single machine
â€¢ Execution layer: Reth v0.1.0-alpha.12 : support Canyon upgrade on OP Stack networks (not OP mainnet)
and fix for pruned node operators
Execution layer:
â€¢ Reth v0.1.0-alpha.12 : support Canyon upgrade on OP Stack networks (not OP mainnet) and fix for
pruned node operators
Research
â€¢ Barnabe: Liquefaction , semantics of liquid staking
Barnabe: Liquefaction , semantics of liquid staking
â€¢ Chipmunk : synchronized lattice-based multi-signature scheme, plausibly secure against quantum
attacks
Chipmunk : synchronized lattice-based multi-signature scheme, plausibly secure against quantum attacks
Layer 2
â€¢ RollupCodes : opcodes, precompiles & system contracts for each rollup
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs Meta EIP7568 : Hardfork meta backfill - Berlin to Shapella Meta EIP7569 : Hardfork meta -
Dencun
EIPs

Meta EIP7568 : Hardfork meta backfill - Berlin to Shapella
â€¢ Meta EIP7569 : Hardfork meta - Dencun
Meta EIP7569 : Hardfork meta - Dencun
â€¢ ERCs (application layer): ERC7565 : Perpetual contract NFTs as collateral for liquidity provision
ERC7566 : Multiplayer onchain game ERC7567 : Splitable utility NFT extension for ERC721
ERCs (application layer):
â€¢ ERC7565 : Perpetual contract NFTs as collateral for liquidity provision
ERC7565 : Perpetual contract NFTs as collateral for liquidity provision

ERC7566 : Multiplayer onchain game

ERC7567 : Splitable utility NFT extension for ERC721
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Testnets: Goerli is deprecated : client teams & EF will exit validators 3 months after upgrading to
Dencun (or 1 month after mainnet Dencun upgrade if later) Sepolia : use for application layer testing
HoleÅ¡ky : use for staking & infrastructure testing OP testnets migrating to OP Sepolia from OP Goerli
Testnets:
â€¢ Goerli is deprecated : client teams & EF will exit validators 3 months after upgrading to Dencun (or
1 month after mainnet Dencun upgrade if later)
Goerli is deprecated : client teams & EF will exit validators 3 months after upgrading to Dencun (or 1
month after mainnet Dencun upgrade if later)

Sepolia : use for application layer testing

OpenZeppelin Contracts wizard adds AI assistant to update code & answer questions, alpha
â€¢ Wake (previously Woke): Python based Solidity dev framework with vulnerability detectors
Wake (previously Woke): Python based Solidity dev framework with vulnerability detectors
â€¢ EVMole : extract function selectors from bytecode, Python & JavaScript implementations
EVMole : extract function selectors from bytecode, Python & JavaScript implementations
â€¢ OP Wagmi : wagmi v2 style hooks to interact with OP Stack networks
OP Wagmi : wagmi v2 style hooks to interact with OP Stack networks

Coinbase build onchain apps starter kit: RainbowKit, wagmi, Next.js & Tailwind CSS

writeups

Onchain stats
â€¢ Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 14.7 to 185.0 gwei, with 34.8 gwei average Zero net issuance
currently at 21.8 gwei 9.8k ETH net burn this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 14.7 to 185.0 gwei, with 34.8 gwei average
â€¢ Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.8 gwei

9.8k ETH net burn this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $1,994 - $2,111, currently $2,084
ETHUSD : $1,994 - $2,111, currently $2,084
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ StakeWise v3 live on mainnet, marketplace of staking offers, node operators & stakers can mint LSD
StakeWise v3 live on mainnet, marketplace of staking offers, node operators & stakers can mint LSD
â€¢ Paradigm distances itself from Blast (despite being lead investor twice for this founder)
Paradigm distances itself from Blast (despite being lead investor twice for this founder)

Nethermind: Lead Software Engineer , BizDev & CTO

at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Circle denies baseless Elizabeth Warren claims on illicit financing & banking Justin Sun

â€¢ Vitalik: techno-optimism , d/acc (defensive/decentralization/differential acceleration)
